segments.text: Hello , this is Lin Tao . I am calling to inquire about my interview result last week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , I am sorry to say that your experience doesn't fit the job at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry to hear that , but could you inform me why I failed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have to say your education and experience are very outstanding , but it seems that you are not good at working in a team which we attach great importance to .
segments.speaker: S2
